alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany; Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 6:44PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Tammany, east central Tangipahoa and south central Washington Parishes through 715 PM CDT... At 643 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Abita Springs, or 8 miles northeast of Covington, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Abita Springs, Folsom and Enon. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 50 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany; Washington
